p: The data were expressed as the mean±SD. The statistical analyses were conducted using the Student’s paired t-test. The difference between the mean was considered statistically significant at P<0.05. The pharmacokinetic parameters were calculated with the Statistics software program DAS 2.0 (Mathematical Pharmacology Professional Committee of Shanghai, Shanghai, China). The statistical analysis of the standard curve was carried out by OriginPro 8.0 software (OriginLab Corporation, Northampton, USA).
